# Royal Aviation Lanka (Pvt) Ltd

Website: https://www.royalaviationlanka.com/
Sitemap: https://www.royalaviationlanka.com/sitemap.xml

## What this site is
Royal Aviation Lanka is a Sri Lankaâ€“based aviation services provider offering ground handling and flight support services (24/7 operations).

## Key services
- Ground Handling Services
- Ramp Handling
- Flight Dispatch & Planning
- Permits & Documentation

## Location
81/16, Kalyani Road, Wattala, Sri Lanka.

## Contact
- Phone / WhatsApp (24/7): +94 71 819 7889
- Email: operations@royalaviationlanka.com
